title: help- keen the 5th
content:
hello everyone
that's really great that this site exists and that it is sucha marvelous gathering of keen fans. ;P

i've got a question regarding keen 5- how to get to the platform where you gotta fly with your rocket? i've tried but so far i've not managed to.

i'd be very greatful. if it have been asked for- sorry for doubling topics.

take care
bye

title: Re: help- keen the 5th
content:
I guess you mean the one in the Omegamatic map, at the bottom.
[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/Gravitational_Damping_Hub]www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/Gravitational_Damping_Hub[/url]
The secret level can be reached by "jumping down" (look down + jump keys) at the arch near the exit of Level 11 (Grav. Damping Hub), you'll fall to an invisible corridor. Walk left, let yourself fall thru, and you'll reach a room which you must make it past in order to get to the teleporter. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] It was hard for me to find it initially.------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]
[url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm20.showMessage?topicID=12.topic]Get Windows/Linux native LModKeen 2 with integrated FIN2BMP![/url]. You know you want to.
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/meta/projectpage.htm]The META engine for 2D games[/url].

title: Re: help- keen the 5th
content:
Gee, can you believe I didn't even know about this one? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] Or I forgot about it, because I've definately been in the level on the planet at the bottom of the map...____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: help- keen the 5th
content:
It took me a while to figure this one out. I had just gotten bored, and started decoding random signs. Then I noticed "Jump down at arch." I wondered, "What arch?" for a few minutes, then realized what it meant.

Heh, before I knew that, I used to use a glitch to get outside of the Omegamatic, and then I would walk around, hoping I'd find a way into the secret level... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] -Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: help- keen the 5th
content:

Awww! Feel the love!

title: Re: help- keen the 5th
content: I found it by using F10+Y cheat! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

title: Re: help- keen the 5th
content:
The very first time I reached the Korath III base was completely by accident. No, I dont mean that I discovered the arch thing. Instead, I went through the door that's before the arch, and I randomly popped out on Korath III.

I was left tantalized for a couple years, because I could only play the level for about 6 seconds before the game crashed. The error has never repeated itself since, but it sure was wierd when it happened.

title: Re: help- keen the 5th
content:
It was when you played the level on Easy difficulty in version 1.0 (IIRC). Hahaha, that error used to drive me crazy.--------------------
